content:
From: Sean McLaughlin <seanmcl@cmu.edu>
OK, I think PolyML.commit() does the job I want. Sorry to bother.

Sean

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
That's just the low level interface of Poly/ML. Isabelle provides its own
abstraction. See the Isabelle system manual for further details.

Makarius
